header.title: React Three Fiber & 3D Web Development
header.description: Master declarative 3D graphics development in the React ecosystem

r3fIntro.title: What is React Three Fiber?
r3fIntro.description: A declarative 3D development library that enables using Three.js the React way

features.title: Declarative 3D Development
features.desc: Build 3D scenes with JSX syntax for intuitive development

features.title: React Ecosystem Integration
features.desc: Use React patterns like hooks, context, and suspense directly

features.title: Automatic Resource Management
features.desc: GPU memory is automatically cleaned up on component unmount

features.title: Built-in Performance Optimization
features.desc: Efficient rendering through React's reconciliation algorithm

r3fIntro.keyPointDesc: React Three Fiber wraps all Three.js functionality as React components, allowing you to build powerful 3D graphics while leveraging your existing React knowledge. The declarative approach improves code readability, and automatic resource management eliminates memory leak concerns.

devSetup.title: Development Environment Setup
devSetup.description: Building an R3F project with Vite + React + TypeScript
tips: @react-three/drei provides essential utility components for R3F development
Installing TypeScript types (@types/three) provides autocomplete and type safety
Adding OrbitControls enables mouse camera manipulation for easier development

coreConcepts.title: Core Concepts
coreConcepts.description: Understanding Canvas, Geometry, Material, Lighting, and Shadows
coreConcepts.canvasDesc: Canvas is R3F's top-level component that automatically sets up the WebGL renderer, camera, and scene.
coreConcepts.geometryDesc: Geometry defines the shape of 3D objects, while Material defines surface color and texture.
coreConcepts.shadowTip2: - Set on lights and objects to cast shadows
coreConcepts.shadowTip3: - Set on floors/walls to receive shadows

hooksAnimation.title: Hooks and Animation
hooksAnimation.description: Implementing animations with useFrame, useThree, and useLoader

hooks.name: useFrame
hooks.desc: Callback executed every frame in render loop

hooks.name: useThree
hooks.desc: Access R3F internal state (camera, gl, scene, etc.)

hooks.name: useLoader
hooks.desc: Async loading of assets like textures and models

hooksAnimation.useFrameDesc: useFrame runs every frame to implement animations. Use the delta value to create frame-independent animations.
hooksAnimation.useThreeDesc: useThree provides access to R3F's internal state, allowing you to manipulate camera, renderer, scene, and more.
hooksAnimation.useLoaderDesc: useLoader integrates Three.js loaders with React Suspense to load textures and 3D models.
hooksAnimation.customHookDesc: Smooth value transitions using lerp (linear interpolation)
tips: Using delta value ensures consistent animation speed regardless of frame rate
Subscribing only to needed values in useThree prevents unnecessary re-renders
Cache heavy computations with useMemo for performance optimization

dreiUtilities.title: @react-three/drei Utilities
dreiUtilities.description: Essential utilities for camera controls, environments, text, model loading, and more
dreiUtilities.presetList: Use presets like city, sunset, dawn, night, warehouse, forest, apartment, studio, park, lobby, or apply custom HDRI.
dreiUtilities.tipDesc: Use Drei's useGLTF.preload to preload models and reduce delay on first render. Use Clone component to efficiently render the same model multiple times.

interaction.title: Interaction
interaction.description: Pointer events, drag and drop, and raycasting
interaction.dragDesc: Combine use-gesture and react-spring to implement smooth drag interactions.
interaction.libraryNoteDesc: Use @use-gesture/react for gesture detection and @react-spring/three for smooth animations.
interaction.raycastDesc: Use raycasting to detect objects based on mouse position in 3D space.
tips: Control cursor directly by changing document.body.style.cursor
Use e.point to get the exact click position in 3D space

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Instancing, frame control, memory management, and monitoring
performance.instanceDesc: Render thousands of objects with the same geometry and material in a single draw call for significant performance improvement.
performance.frameDesc: Control rendering frequency with Canvas's frameloop property to prevent unnecessary re-renders.
performance.memoryDesc: R3F automatically cleans up resources on component unmount, but custom cleanup may be needed in some cases.
checklist: Use InstancedMesh when rendering many identical objects
Subscribe only to needed state in useThree to minimize re-renders
Optimize texture resolution and use compressed formats
Apply LOD (Level of Detail) for complex models

advancedTechniques.title: Advanced Techniques
advancedTechniques.description: Post-processing, shaders, physics engine, and VR/AR
advancedTechniques.postDesc: Apply various post-processing effects like bloom, chromatic aberration, and vignette with @react-three/postprocessing.
advancedTechniques.shaderDesc: Write custom vertex/fragment shaders using shaderMaterial.
advancedTechniques.shaderNoteDesc: If you're new to GLSL shaders, we recommend The Book of Shaders (thebookofshaders.com).
advancedTechniques.physicsDesc: Apply realistic physics simulations like gravity, collision, and elasticity with @react-three/rapier.
advancedTechniques.xrDesc: Build WebXR-based VR/AR experiences as React components with @react-three/xr.
